general: A bittersweet energy unfolds as you enter new epochs of success, dear Gemini. The Moon in Cancer aligns with the nodes of destiny, reminding you of where you come from while aspiring to greater heights. It is essential to leave behind the doubts rooted since your childhood, recognizing that you have the power to overcome obstacles and thrive. A wave of blessings may leave you with a surplus of money, but be wise before spending. The imbalanced aspects between the Moon, Jupiter, Mercury, and Venus urge you to resist excesses. Find your happiness in love and spiritual fulfillment rather than in material indulgences.
love: Avoid unnecessary conflicts and focus on sincere communication.
work: Use your creativity to solve problems at work, as this could lead you to unexpected opportunities.
health: Take the time to recharge mentally; meditation could bring you great comfort.
advice: Free yourself from doubts to embrace your potential.
teaser: A day of success and renewal awaits you.
